text: hi, one question, I'm trying to impement a custom module with "tabbed" content. Content creator must be able to create tabs (and tab content of course)
I'm trying with a flexible row, and each tabitem is a custom module
is there any way to render flexible row items manually? I need to wrap tab and tab content in separate divs
Other aproach would be to make two separated custom modules (one for tab, and other to tab content) and relate both with a filed. But dont know how to meke this in visual editor
You could use a flexible column to place this information. Place a div wrapper around your flex column content and use jquery to build the tabs based on the title of the rich text of each module.
thanks <@U25C65C3S> , so the only solution is to build it with jquery?
The option you mentioned with the custom modules would work too, but jquery would be the smoothest option IMHO
I would prefer a server side render aproach but I will implement it whit Js , thanks for your response
If you have access to HubDB you could do it with that
The problem with HubDB is that has not a full Rich HTML editor
the editor is limited, and I need to include text and images in the tab content
You could have an image column (or multiple) and the rich text.
